# Docker image for ChIP-Seq processes

It is based on `ubuntu-14.04` version of [`docker.io/resolwe/base`](
https://hub.docker.com/r/resolwe/base/) image.

Included bioinformatics tools
-----------------------------
* ROSE2 (v1.0.5)
* BAMPLOT (v0.9.0)
* MACS (v1.4.2)
* MACS2 (v2.1.1.20160309)
* BAMLIQUIDATOR (v1.3)
* SAMTOOLS (v0.1.19)
